title: Nail Bar Boys
overview: Meet Astro, Little Kenny, Brandon, Bruno, Dragon and Big Tony. Together, they work in a nail salon in Liverpool. But this is no ordinary workplace - it's all about fun, friendship and fighting to overcome the odds.Follow these British Vietnamese lads from Liverpool and Manchester as they support each other, and their customers, through some of life's toughest challenges, including dealing with addiction, overcoming racism and searching for love.The larger-than-life characters are like local celebrities, and we get to know them at work, at home and at play.
